no_wallet_01: It seems you don't have a wallet yet, that's fine, let's create one for you! Click the button bellow and we'll get you started.
restore: To restore your wallet, you need the wallet ID and key!
warning_msg: The wallet and key, are generated and stored on your browser. Backup and secure the Wallet ID and Key, as if you lose them your funds will be lost.
warning_msg_2: Backup and secure the Wallet ID and Key, as if you lose them your funds will e lost.
lnurl_click: Scan the LNURL QR code, or click the image to open in wallet, to withdraw your balance! These LNURLs are ONE-TIME use.
